瞖字的基本解释

瞖
yì
古同“翳”（ａ．眼角膜上所生的障蔽视线的白斑；ｂ．眼生白内障）。

瞖字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yì］
［《廣韻》於計切，去霽，影。］
(1)眼病。白内障。俗称白翳。
(2)眼生白翳。

瞖字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【目字部】　瞖； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页815第32
【廣韻】【正韻】於計切【集韻】【韻會】壹計切，?音翳。【玉篇】眼疾也。【正字通】目障也。【宋史·謝皇后傳】后生而瞖一目。　又藥名。【本草·釋名】羅勒。一名瞖子草，以其子治瞖也。

瞖字的源字形

字形对比：

瞖字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Booze
yì
Ancient Tong "Eye" (a. Vitiligo on the cornea that obstructs the line of sight; b. Cataract in the eye).
Booze
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yì］
["Guangyun" Yu Jiqie, go to Ji, shadow. ]
(1) Eye disease. cataract. Commonly known as Bai Yi.
(2) The eyes grow white pansies.
Booze

[Afternoon Concentration] [Headword Department] 　瞖; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 815 32
[Guang Yun] [Zheng Yun] Yu Jiqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Yi Jiqie,? Yinyi. [Jade articles] Eye diseases also. [Zhengzitong] The eyesight is also impaired. [Song History·The Biography of Queen Xie] After birth, he scorned a glance.　Also the name of the medicine. 【Materia Medica·Release Name】Basil. A scorpion grass uses his son to treat scorpion.
